plot: The funeral in his native village evokes the main character's reminiscences from the childhood, but the bygone time exist only in his memories.
title: Izgubljeni zavicaj
plot_es: The funeral in his native village evokes the main character's reminiscences from the childhood, but the bygone time exist only in his memories.
plot_en: The funeral in his native village evokes the main character's reminiscences from the childhood, but the bygone time exist only in his memories.
